description: the laboratory will be constructed in the space that was formerly used for storage  The two separate rooms required to be created in the the former storage space area include the Analitical QC and  HZ surveillance room.The Workers installing the HVAC piping and the general piping, and electrical panel Installing the new HVAC roof system. installation of new admited equipement of these of jobs also should be done then.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: [EF944-231286] Laboratory Layout Arrangement

### Reference
* Reference Number: WS3751110527-Doc3753340311
* Solicitation Number: WS3751110527
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: November 16, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 8, 2022 2:00 PM EST (Expired)

### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), formerly known as the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), is soliciting proposals for a specialized public building construction service to convert a storage room into a microbiology laboratory facility for Health Canada, located at 1001 St-Laurent Blvd, Longueuil. The project involves:

* Two separate rooms
* Dedicated HVAC roof system installation
* HVAC piping installation
* New electrical panel installation

### Qualification Criteria and Evaluation
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

### Tendering Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Longueuil, Quebec
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Industry Classification: Specialized public building construction services (UNSPSC *72121400)

### Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Information
	+ Name: France Bélisle (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [france.belisle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:france.belisle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: None

### Notice and Further Information
Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14655419?extsite=MTQ2NTU0MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/r
